title: URL Shortening Service
description: Design a system that takes long URLs and converts them into short links.

title: Social Media Feed
description: Design a system that generates a user's personalized social media feed based on their interests and social connections.

title: Online Food Ordering System
description: Design a system for ordering food online, including user registration, browsing menus, placing orders, and payment processing.

title: Content Delivery Network (CDN)
description: Design a system that efficiently delivers web content to users by distributing it across multiple servers located in different geographic locations.

title: Search Engine
description: Design a system that efficiently indexes and retrieves relevant web pages in response to user search queries.

title: Online Marketplace
description: Design a system for buying and selling goods or services online, including user registration, product listings, search functionality, and transaction processing.

title: Design a chat service like Facebook Messenger or WhatsApp
description: You'll design a service that allows users to chat with each other over the internet. Conversations can be one-on-one or can be group chats with many members. Messages should only be accessible by those included in the conversation.

title: Design Uber
description:
Create a ride-sharing service that matches users with nearby drivers. Users can input a destination and transmit their current location and nearby drivers are notified within seconds.

The app then tracks a route between the driver and user’s current locations, then from the user’s location to the destination.

title: Chat Application
description: Design a system for real-time messaging between users, including features such as one-on-one chats, group chats, and message history.

title: Online Banking System
description: Design a system for managing banking transactions, including account management, fund transfers, transaction history, and security measures.

title: Ride-Sharing Service
description: Design a system for matching passengers with drivers, handling ride requests, tracking locations, and processing payments.

title: Music Streaming Service
description: Design a system for streaming music to users, including features such as playlists, recommendations, and offline playback.

title: Online Education Platform
description: Design a system for delivering online courses, including user registration, course management, video streaming, and assessments.

title: Appointment Scheduling System
description: Design a system for scheduling appointments between users and service providers, managing availability, and sending reminders.
